name: Indemnity upon reporting
text: [§302A-1003]  Indemnity upon reporting.  The State shall indemnify and hold harmless anyone participating in good faith in making a report pursuant to section 302A-1002 from any civil liability that might otherwise be incurred or imposed by, or as a result of, the making of the report. [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2]
